title: "Mindmap diagram demo"

```{mermaid}

        mindmap
        root
            child1((Circle))
                grandchild 1
                grandchild 2
            child2(Round rectangle)
                grandchild 3
                grandchild 4
            child3[Square]
                grandchild 5
                ::icon(mdi mdi-fire)
                gc6((grandchild 6))
                ::icon(mdi mdi-fire)
                gc7((grandgrandchild 8))
    
```
